faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about ContPAQi AI Bridge

1.question: Is my data secure?
1.answer: Yes, all processing happens locally on your machine. Your invoice data never leaves your computer or gets sent to any cloud service. We take data privacy seriously.

2.question: Which ContPAQi versions are supported?
2.answer: We support ContPAQi Comercial and ContPAQi Contabilidad versions 2020 and later. The software integrates directly through the official ContPAQi SDK.

3.question: Do I need an internet connection?
3.answer: Only for initial activation and software updates. Once activated, all AI processing works completely offline on your local machine.

4.question: What invoice formats are supported?
4.answer: We support PDF invoices, scanned images (TIFF, JPG, PNG), and Mexican CFDI electronic invoices (versions 3.3 and 4.0).

5.question: Is there a free trial?
5.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required to start.

6.question: What kind of support do you offer?
6.answer: All plans include email support. Professional plans include priority support with 24-hour response time. Enterprise customers get dedicated support with phone access and custom onboarding.
